Induction
Labour can be induced if your 
baby is overdue or there is 
any sort of risk to you or your 
baby’s	health	–	for	example,	if	
you have high blood pressure 
or if your baby is failing to grow 
and thrive.
Induction is always planned 
in advance, so you will be 
able	to	talk	over	the	benefits	
and disadvantages with your 
doctor	and	midwife	and	find	
out why they recommen
